original: Åhmian, Egon Hjalmar, komminister, Gate, f. 12/12/10 i Vänersb.^ G. 38 m. Greta Helén. Barn: Kerstin f. 39, Anders 41, Karin 45. — Stud:ex. i Lund 29, teol. kand. 34 o. prästv. i Skara s. å. Pastorsadj. i Långared 34, Enskede 35, kateket, pred. v. Gam-melby ålderd:ihem o. Stureby vårdhem v. Sthlm, kommin. i S, Fågelås fr. 38. Ordf. i kyrkoråd, kyrko^stäm-m’a, barnav:nd, insp. f. Hjo komm. mellansk. fr. 41, ordf. i Fågelås hem-hjälpsnd, i S. Fågelås RK-krets, in-kvartrled., omb. f. inform :styr., låns-nykterh :ndns omb., led. av Skara stiftsråd o. ungd:råd, ordf. i Skara stiftskrets av SYPF, distr :chef f. Ska-rab. scoutdistr. av SS. Res. t. Tyskland. Skr.: S. Fågelås kyrka, en minnesbok (42), Fågelås, ant. t. en s o e ke n hi s to ri a (44).
translated: Egon Hjalmar Åhmian, vicar, born on December 12, 1910 in Vänersb.^ Married in 1938 to Greta Helén. Children: Kerstin, born in 1939, Anders, born in 1941, Karin, born in 1945. Education: Student examination in Lund in 1929, Bachelor of Theology in 1934, ordained priest in Skara in the same year. Assistant pastor in Långared in 1934, Enskede in 1935, catechist, preacher at Gam-melby Elderly Home and Stureby Care Home in Stockholm, curate in S, Fågelås from 1938. Chairman of the church council, church assembly, child welfare committee, inspector for Hjo municipality in central Sweden from 1941, chairman of the Fågelås home-help association, the S. Fågelås Red Cross circle, lodging committee, delegate for the information board, representative for the temperance movement, member of the Skara diocesan council and youth council, chairman of the Skara diocese branch of SYPF, district manager for the Skaraborg scout district of SS. Traveled to Germany. Writings: S. Fågelås church, a commemorative book (1942), Fågelås, possibly a local history book (1944).
